bio: Kaie is a Reachwoman and a member of the Forsworn. She is skilled with magic, knowing spells such as Flames, Oakflesh, and Raise Zombie. She is loyal to Madanach, the King in Rags. Kaie, Madanach, and the other Forsworn comrades have long been held prisoner in Cidhna Mine, underneath Markarth (the capital of The Reach). If Kaie and the other Forsworn prisoners manage to escape their captivity, she and the others will follow Madanach to Druadach Redoubt to the east, where she will take up residence with her Forsworn comrades and continue their rebellion against the Nord occupiers of The Reach.
name: Kaie
